articles.author: Evan Perez, Jeff Zeleny, Manu Raju and Dan Merica, CNN
articles.title: Trump nominee for top Agriculture post withdraws amid Russia probe
articles.description: Sam Clovis, President Donald Trump's nominee to be the Department of Agriculture's chief scientist, withdrew himself from consideration Thursday, the White House announced.

articles.author: Jeremy Herb and Manu Raju, CNN
articles.title: Mueller's charges complicate the Hill's Russia inquiries
articles.description: The charges against three former Trump campaign aides this week provided a jolt to congressional Russia investigators who now know special counsel Robert Mueller is moving quickly — and his moves will shut down potential lanes of inquiry for them and likely eliminate the chances of lawmakers to question those aides.

articles.author: Jennifer Hansler, CNN
articles.title: VA governor: If any American was involved with election interference, 'it's treason'
articles.description: Virginia Gov. Terry McAuliffe suggests special counsel Robert Mueller's investigation could reveal a stark conclusion: treason.

articles.title: Clinton defends funding the dossier - CNN Video
articles.description: During an appearance on "The Daily Show," Trevor Noah asked Hillary Clinton if there is a difference between her campaign funding the dossier research and the Trump campaign's connections to Russia.

articles.author: Scott Jennings
articles.title: Stupidity brought Papadopoulos into Trump's orbit
articles.description: Trump appears to have brought on Papadopoulos with little vetting in order to show he had a foreign policy team. Now a problem, he was a hanger-on of a type familiar to people experienced  with campaigns, writes Scott Jennings.

articles.title: Manafort traveled under fake name - CNN Video
articles.description: How rich are Paul Manafort and Rick Gates, and where did they travel? That question lingered over the pair's court hearing after both faced the first indictments from Justice Department special counsel Robert Mueller's investigation into Russian meddling in the 2016 presidential election. CNN's Jessica Schneider reports.

articles.author: Dominique Van Heerden, Laila Ben Allal, and Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
articles.title: Life after Raqqa: 'Mom, I'm afraid'
articles.description: After months living under ISIS' brutal rule, Maha finally escaped. But voice messages sent to her mother reveal the uncertain future Raqqa refugees still face.

articles.author: Lauren Fox, Deirdre Walsh and Ashley Killough, CNN
articles.title: GOP unveils key details in new tax plan
articles.description: House Republicans are unveiling key details and the text behind their tax legislation Thursday, but not without some reservations from rank-and-file members.

articles.author: Holly Yan and Tony Marco, CNN
articles.title: Suspect accused of randomly killing 3 people at Walmart under arrest
articles.description: Scott Ostrem, the man suspected of killing three people at a Colorado Walmart on Wednesday night, has been arrested, Thornton police tweeted Thursday.

articles.author: Maegan Vazquez, CNN
articles.title: Trump calls for death penalty in NYC truck attack
articles.description: President Donald Trump is calling for the death penalty against the man charged with mowing down pedestrians and bikers in New York City, raising the question of whether his rhetoric could imperil prosecutors' efforts in the case.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 'Big void' identified in Great Pyramid
articles.description: Scanning technology suggests there is a large, previously unknown cavity in the ancient monument.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Republican tax plan to target mortgages
articles.description: The proposal retains the top individual tax rate, but targets a popular mortgage interest deduction.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Arrest call for sacked Catalan leader
articles.description: Prosecutors in Madrid also asked for eight ex-officials to be jailed over a banned independence vote.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump urges death penalty for NY suspect
articles.description: Legal commentators suggest the president's execution calls could affect chances of a fair trial.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Refugees 'dig for water' in Australia camp
articles.description: About 600 men are refusing to leave a detention centre in Papua New Guinea following its closure.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: The US state that bans sparklers but not guns
articles.description: American firework laws may seem strict - but have they got the right idea?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 'Er... Sorry': Banksy's new West Bank work
articles.description: It was unveiled by an actor dressed as the Queen at an "apology" party for Palestinians.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: 'Nonchalant' Walmart gunman arrested
articles.description: A gunman has been arrested after shooting three dead in an incident police say they cannot explain.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Kevin Spacey is 'seeking treatment'
articles.description: The actor is "taking the time necessary" to look for treatment in the wake of recent allegations.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: CIA releases Bin Laden diary and videos
articles.description: Video of the wedding of Bin Laden's favourite son is among half a million files released by the CIA.

articles.author: Sam Jones
articles.title: Spanish prosecutor requests European arrest warrant for Puigdemont
articles.description: Deposed Catalan leader and four of his ministers failed to return from Belgium to testify in court on possible charges relating to independence declaration

articles.author: Richard Partington
articles.title: Bank of England raises UK interest rates for first time in over a decade
articles.description: Threadneedle Street increases cost of borrowing from 0.25% to 0.5%, reversing emergency action after Brexit vote

articles.author: Andrew Sparrow, Henry McDonald
articles.title: Gavin Williamson's appointment as defence secretary triggers backlash - Politics live
articles.description: Rolling coverage of the day’s political developments, including Theresa May appointing a new defence secretary to replace Michael Fallon

articles.author: Graham Ruddick
articles.title: World media chiefs call for EU inquiry into Maltese journalist's murder
articles.description: Guardian editor and BBC news director say Daphne Caruana Galizia’s death is appalling reminder of dangers journalists face

articles.author: Ian Sample
articles.title: Archaeologists discover mysterious void deep within Great Pyramid of Giza
articles.description: Muon-detecting sensors have revealed a huge hidden cavity hidden within the pyramid – the first major structural find since the 19th century

articles.author: Alan Travis
articles.title: More than 140,000 told by UK immigration they face removal – watchdog
articles.description: Borders inspector’s reports give indication of how many are in Britain without legal status and may be forced to leave

articles.author: Sally Weale
articles.title: Secondary school criticised for installing CCTV in pupil toilet areas
articles.description: Head says cameras are needed to clamp down on ‘disappointing behaviour’ while parents claim surveillance is ‘intrusive and creepy’

articles.author: Peter Walker
articles.title: Brexit impact papers to be released in victory for Labour
articles.description: Commons leader says ministers need to work out how to disclose information while protecting negotiations with EU

articles.title: Russian hacking went far beyond US election, digital hitlist reveals
articles.description: Hackers targeted Ukrainian officers, US defense contractors, Russian opposition figures and many others, according to previously unpublished list

articles.author: Kim Willsher
articles.title: Runaway seven-year-old slips past security on to plane without a ticket
articles.description: Girl walks off from parents in Geneva to nearby railway station and boards flight to Corsica before being noticed by crew

articles.author: Rani Molla
articles.title: How Bozoma Saint John plans to fix Uber’s brand problem
articles.description: “Nobody is okay with this.”

articles.author: Peter Kafka
articles.title: The head of the NBA wants his games to look more like Twitch
articles.description: Pro sports on TV looks the same way it looked 30 years ago, Adam Silver says. He thinks the internet can change that.

articles.author: Rani Molla
articles.title: A startup investor with billion dollar exits on how retail must change
articles.description: Kirsten Green, founder of Forerunner Ventures, breaks down the retail landscape.

articles.author: Johana Bhuiyan
articles.title: Williams-Sonoma CEO Laura Alber: ‘I do not believe Amazon is killing retailers’
articles.description: “I think retailers’ bad service is killing retailers,” Alber said.

articles.author: Eric Johnson
articles.title: How Rolling Stone co-founder Jann Wenner built and lost a rock-and-roll empire
articles.description: “Sticky Fingers” author Joe Hagan says his new biography of Wenner ends on a “tragic” note for both the man and his groundbreaking magazine.

articles.author: Recode Staff
articles.title: Full transcript: Recode’s Tony Romm answers questions about Russia’s social media meddling on Too Embarrassed to Ask
articles.description: “Silicon Valley is finally being held to the fire in Washington, D.C.”

articles.author: Eric Johnson
articles.title: This week’s showdown between Congress and Silicon Valley, explained
articles.description: Yelp VP Luther Lowe and trial lawyer Beth Wilkinson break it down on Recode Decode with Kara Swisher and political strategist Hilary Rosen.

articles.author: Recode Staff
articles.title: Full transcript: Scroll CEO Tony Haile on Recode Media
articles.description: “There’s a Moore’s law of advertising, which is that ad formats double in frustration every 18 months.”

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: England: Tammy Abraham, Joe Gomez & Ruben Loftus-Cheek called up
articles.description: England call up the uncapped Tammy Abraham, Joe Gomez and Ruben Loftus-Cheek for November's friendlies against Germany and Brazil.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Tottenham 3-1 Real Madrid: The result that makes Spurs Champions League contenders?
articles.description: Tottenham will take huge self belief from the way they beat champions Real Madrid at Wembley, says Phil McNulty.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: World Series 2017: Houston Astros beat Los Angeles Dodgers for 4-3 series win
articles.description: The Houston Astros win their first World Series title by beating the Los Angeles Dodgers 5-1 in the decisive seventh game.

articles.author: BBC Three
articles.title: UFC 217: Michael Bisping has come a long way to become champion
articles.description: On Saturday night at UFC 217, middleweight champion Michael Bisping will fight Canada's Georges St-Pierre, at New York's Madison Square Garden. And, from fighting for free in the UK when no one knew what the sport was, to winning the middleweight title, the Brit has come a long way.Ahead of this weekend's bout, he tells BBC Three how he made his way to the top of MMA, insist...

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Marland Yarde: Chris Robshaw says Harlequins in 'better place' without winger
articles.description: Harlequins will be "in a better place" without England winger Marland Yarde following his move to Sale, says flanker Chris Robshaw.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: FA Cup first round: Hyde United, The Hitman and Muhammad Ali
articles.description: Former world boxing champion Ricky Hatton will be cheering for non-league Hyde United against MK Dons in the FA Cup on Friday.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Manu Tuilagi: Plans to extend Premiership Rugby season are 'ridiculous'
articles.description: England and Leicester Tigers centre Manu Tuilagi says he disagrees with Premiership Rugby's 'ridiculous' plans to extend the domestic season.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2017: England add three players to squad before Test
articles.description: England call up Kate Cross, Tash Farrant and Amy Jones to their Ashes squad before the Test against Australia in Sydney.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Rugby League World Cup 2017: Shaun Edwards gives England fans three reasons for optimism
articles.description: Former England player Shaun Edwards gives fans three reasons to be optimistic following their opening-day defeat to Australia in the 2017 Rugby League World Cup.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Sergio Aguero: Why Man City's record-breaking striker is so special - Alan Shearer
articles.description: Sergio Aguero is Manchester City's greatest goalscorer - and he is the best striker in the Premier League too, according to Alan Shearer.
